name: Spy+ Crusher Elite Goggles - Unisex
description: Simple goggles for crushers who aren't fussed about bells and whistles. The ventilated frame and dual-layered lenses reduce the likelihood of fogging up.Fits medium-sized faces best.Lightweight, flexible polyurethane frame.Patented Rise™ ventilation system combats lens fogging.Triple layer Isotron™ face foam is 3 different densities and features moisture wicking Dri-Force™ fleece.Silicone-ribbed strap.Double-layered thermal lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratch protection.Cylindrical lenses provide crisp detail edge-to-edge.
